attributes.additional_details:
OK, Im an adult involved with children in the local Cub Scout Pack, Local Rugby Club and as a qualified Badminton Coach.

To carry out these roles I have to have 3 different CRB checks, why on earth should that be, I assume all organisations ask for their own checks, but why not have a centralised department that deals with CRB information and each person who has a CRB check has a unique code that can be then given to whatever organisation needs to see it.

Having 3 CRB checks is a poor use of time and effort and I wish to petition to streamline it to reduce paperwork, time and cost.
